messages.title: PROTECTING OUR NHS
messages.content: Julian reveals plan to save health services. Stop Conservative cuts and provide our doctors and nurses with the support they need. Push for more funding for mental health care. As well as more investment in treatments, increase funding for prevention of illness.

messages.title: PROTECTING SCHOOL BUDGETS
messages.content: Cambridgeshire schools are set to lose over £25 million across Cambridge, according to leading teaching unions.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Julian Huppert vows to fight Brexit. Remain campaigner Julian Huppert is being tipped by many to make a return to Parliament.
Stop Conservative cuts and provide our doctors and nurses with the support they need. Push for more funding for mental health care.

images.caption: Julian with representatives in various community settings.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet contains references to tactical voting considerations, highlighting Julian Huppert as an early favorite according to bookies.
